channel.title: 562 donator box?
channel.description:
I have seen a donator box like this before and I'm wondering if anyone has a tutorial for it or knows how to make it. I know the interface id for the original interface is 583 but I've no idea how one would go about editing this. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2zdynt1.jpg[/img]

item.title: 562 donator box?
item.dc:creator: @stooks stooks
item.description:
@stooks wrote:

oh so you don’t have it already? Adding it would be simple…just clickbuttons.java i would think, make is so when you click the chest id “xx” also declare it as a casec.getPA().showInterface(17100); Edditing the pictures would be in your sprites…then the rest would be when you hover over it addHover(18052, 1, 0, 19151, 1, "Interfaces/Dungeoneering/CROSSBOW", 46, 50, "Buy 1 Chaotic Crossbow"); as an example, case 70132: if (c.dungPoints >= 200000) { c.dungPoints -= 200000; c.sendMessage("You buy a chaotic crossbow!"); c.getItems().addItem(18357, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Dungeoneering Tokens To Buy This!"); }

Read full topic
